climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Ultra Soft Feeling: PAGISOFE rugs is built with a soft velvet surface and a memory-foam, leave this rug feeling soft and luxurious, make your children, baby and pets more comfy and warm when they play on the floor.

Perfect For Any Room: The plush area rug create an intimate atmosphere with a coziness feeling, cozy to the touch, warm and homey, and skin-friendly which perfect for living room, bedroom, nursery, dorm, playroom, apartment, home office, study and foyer, Indulge and invest in a rug made with supreme durability and luxurious comfort.

Contracted Style & Complement Your Decor: The company's original intention is to design simple and practical rugs. Every concept should be purposeful and direct. We use simple lines and single colors to interpret the concept of modern area rug.Make the space seem coziness and comfortable conviviality.Color will stay nice and vibrant. Additionally, the rug comes in a number of sizes and colors to match the decor and layout of your room.

Safe Materials & Good Gift: This super soft, velvety carpet is made from polyester material, makes you feel like walking on the clouds and perfect for tummy time for baby. The rugs are friendly for kid and pet! PAGISOFE rugs is a good gift for grandson, granddaughter, little girl boy, baby girl boy, toddler, teenage teen girls, they will love it.

Cleaning Instructions:Wash with cold water on gentle cycle and with a mild detergent (not to add bleach).Hang the area rugs to dry naturally after washing, don't use the dryer because of rubber backing. This is the most convenient way with minimal efforts.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How is the rug packaged? Since this rug comes with a vacuum Packaging bag,it’s normal to see the fibers on the rug is not fluffy enough and there will be some creases. Please lay it flat for 3 days and wait patiently for its recovery.Please do not worry about this situation. How do I clean this rug? Vacuum it with a low-powered handheld hoover. We suggest you vacuum or wipe it. When cleaning is required,please hand wash and air-dry to make rug fluffy. After the rug is air-dried, it’s better if you fluff it. Not machine washable. What else should be noted? Images may differ slightly from the actual colour of the product due to different lighting effects of monitors and cameras. Can I cut this rug to the size I want without it falling off the edge of the cut? It is not recommended that you cut the rug, you can buy a rug that meets your needs to prevent the rug from falling off after cutting. Where are these rugs suitable for? Rug is versatile enough for the girls boys bedroom, living room, nursery, dorm, playroom, apartment, home office, study, or foyer, Indulge and invest in a rug made with supreme durability and luxurious comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: WHEN I UNROLLED THIS RUG OUT, I WAS ABSOLUTLEY AMAZED. THIS IS SUCH A BEAUTIFUL, VIBRANT, BIG, REALLY SOFT RUG. IT WILL FIT PERFECTLY WITH MY GIRLS ROOM. I LAID IT ON MY HARD WOOD FLOORS AND THEY JUST LAID ON IT BC IT WAS SO COMFORTABLE AND VERY SOFT. IT DOES HAVE SOME DOTS UNDERNEATH IT TO HELP IT NOT TO MOVE AROUND. BUT I AM EXTREMLY PLEASED WITH THIS RUG. IT IS BEYOND EXPECTATIONS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Fluffy - Looks like the picture
reviews.reviewText: I like the rug. I was skeptical because the reviews were so out there, but it came in nice. It is thin, but after it fluffed out it was barely noticeable. Overall its worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for decorative uses!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this rug to swap out my year-round rug for the holiday. I needed something green to match my holiday decor that was Grinchmas green. This was perfect. It is super soft and the kids like to lay on it. Honestly, I am questioning why I paid so much for my year-round rug when this one is equally as nice and durable. I think this was an excellent buy, and I will use this company again. A perfect rug for decorating an event or having in your living room. It was a win-win for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and pretty!
reviews.reviewText: So very soft. Beautiful colors. It’s not thick but we are getting a mat to put beneath. Also, it came in a tiny box so compressed that it took a while to get it straightened out. But it’s really nice. 👍🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter absolutely loved this rug. I also got covers that were very similar in texture and rainbow. She loves bright colors and the rug was very soft and fluffy which was another plus. Size was great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Grey tie dye has a blue hue to it
reviews.reviewText: Product is great but coloring is off. In the photo it looks more black and it has a blue hue to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Kind of like a McDonalds burger, its not quite as pretty in person as it is in the picture but I'll say its worth the cost. It is soft. Its just not quite as thick in real life as the picture shows. Maybe its like real grass, if I let it grow a little bit it will match the picture better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars SOFT,SILKY & LITTLE SHEDDING!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Purchased this to put down as a layer inside our camping tent. It’s bright, fun & will make the tent cozier. This rug arrived in a vacuumed packed bag and was fully compressed like a brick. After unpacking, it had folds & creases as expected but after shaking it out a few times & laying it flat, the creases are diminishing. I may put it in the dryer on fluff or very low heat to help it along. This rug is not too thick & verylight weight which is what I wanted., so it takes up less room when we pack up our camping gear & it doesn’t add much poundage to the RV or tow vehicle. The fibers are very soft & silky almost like an infants plush toy. It sheds a little but not excessively. I wouldn’t lay on it with dark clothing tho for sure. It feels nice on bare feet but it does flatten out a bit in spots when you walk on it. So it’s more of an accent rug or layer like I will use it in my camping tent. Not meant for traffic areas or as main carpeting. It shakes out very easy & then fluffs up again. The only way I can describe the backing is ,it is like a bed quilt or thin soft padding with a slight coating & tiny rubber dots that help it to not slide too much. It has a nice sewn fabric edge border which gives it more substance & strength. Upon opening the plastic packaging I noticed a slight smell like kids acrylic paint but it wasn’t bothersome. I’ll have to look up how to clean or wash it because it did not come with any paper insert or manufacturers tags at all… Overall a cute fun accent piece. Looking forward to glamping with it! True to its description & size. The color is like a celery green. I will update later about it’s longevity & how it holds up if it needs to be cleaned.

I got this rug for my niece and she immediately fell in love with it. She calls it her princess rug. It came air sealed so it was pretty flat but give it a few days to settle and the fibers perk right up
pour le plancher de mon chevy G10, jamais vu un tapis aussi doux, le nettoyage est plus difficile

Got it for my enfant as he was beginning to crawl n often bumped his head on the floor.Though it's colourful n looks nice in the kids room but is not cushy/ thick enough to protect the kid if he falls; plus it skids on the marble / tile flooring too... - won't ever recommend it to new moms looking for a rug for kid's activity unless it's only for ornamentation of the room.
Very thin. Edges lift. Slides around as insufficient backing to grip to floor. Not good quality.
